title: incorporate sample depth variance and set GQ
body:
a sample outlier that has a large variance across sites will have a different genotype quality than one with a small variance.

this sample variance can be used to indicate the probability that we'd see a site with this z-score (relative to other samples) by chance. this can be used as the basis for the genotype quality.

title: test on cohort of size ~50
body: we are probably over-fit to CEPH
